attributes.action: Introduce legislation to penalise people who do not contain their dogs on their own property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is currently no way to stop careless owners who allow their dogs to leave their property and roam free.  It is only possible to get local authorities involved if the dog attacks someone.  
It should be every dog owner's responsibility to ensure their pet does not get out of their property, and action should not be pending on someone getting hurt.
